content: While not quite as potent as Drinks, Soaks are important to your overall build to ensure you have an extra passive buff that benefits your style or game while you heal. Having the Gall Gem equipped to your Gourds will moderately increase Poison Resistance for a short duration after using the Gourd.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gall_Gem.md', within the main section titled 'Gall Gem'.
The content is as follows:
While not quite as potent as Drinks, Soaks are important to your overall build to ensure you have an extra passive buff that benefits your style or game while you heal. Having the Gall Gem equipped to your Gourds will moderately increase Poison Resistance for a short duration after using the Gourd.
